text: Malacoscylus lacordairei is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by James Thomson in 1868. It is known from Colombia.BioLib.cz - Malacoscylus lacordairei. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1868
title: Malacoscylus lacordairei
